verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera kīrtana kare nīca bāḍa bāḍa
ei pāpe navadvīpa ha-ibe ujāḍa

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; kīrtana—chanting; kare—does; nīca—lower class; bāḍa bāḍa—again and again; ei pāpe—by this sin; navadvīpa—the whole city of Navadvīpa; ha-ibe—will become; ujāḍa—deserted.
translation: " 'Now the lower classes are chanting the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra again and again. For this sinful activity, the entire city of Navadvīpa will become deserted.
